```{=html}
<nav id="dev-nav">
  <div class="nav nav-tabs" id="nav-tab" role="tablist">

      class="nav-link"
      id="tab-1"

      role="tab"

    <button
      class="nav-link active"
```

```{=html}
<!-- NOTE: Forms will be populated by JS -->
<div id="api-params" class="overlay overlay-blur">
  <div class="overlay-content">
  </div>
</div>

<div id="quarto-controls" class="quarto-controls p-5 d-flex flex-nowrap justify-content-evenly">
  <button id="quarto-controls-render" type="button" data-key="render" class="btn btn-outline-warning">
    <text> Render One</text>
  </button>
  <button id="quarto-controls-get-last" type="button" data-key="get-last" class="btn btn-outline-success">
    <text> Get Last Rendered</text>
  </button>
  <button id="quarto-controls-get-all" type="button" data-key="get-all" class="btn btn-outline-success">
    <text> Get Whole Log</text>
  </button>
  <button id="quarto-controls-clear-logs" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
    <text> Clear Logs</text>
  </button>
  <button id="quarto-controls-clear-renders" type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger">
    <text> Clear Renders</text>
  </button>
</div>
```

::::

```{=html}
<script type="module">
  document.getElementById("title-block-header").remove()
  document.getElementById("quarto-document-content").classList.add("px-1")

  globalThis.serverLog = ServerLog({
    last: 32,
    serverLogContainer: document.querySelector("#live-logs-server tbody"),
    serverLogParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-1"),
  })

  globalThis.quarto = Quarto({
    last: 32,
    filters: {},
    quartoOverlayControls: Overlay(document.getElementById("quarto-overlay")),
    quartoLogs: document.querySelector("#quarto-live-logs tbody"),
    quartoLogsParent: document.querySelector("#tab-content-2"),
    quartoOverlayContent: document.querySelector('#quarto-overlay-content'),
  })

  const quartoContent = document.getElementById("quarto-content")
  quartoContent.classList.remove("page-columns")

  globalThis.quartoControls = QuartoControls()

</script>
```
